definition: Yongle Emperor, reign name of third Ming emperor Zhu Di 朱棣[Zhu1 Di4] (1360-1424), reigned 1403-1424, Temple name 明成祖[Ming2 Cheng2 zu3]
forever/always/perpetual
happy/cheerful/to laugh
music
surname Le
surname Yue
the Yongle Great Encyclopedia (1408)

sentences.english: From the Yongle Emperor onwards, 13 Ming Dynasty Emperors were buried in this area.
sentences.chinese: 自永樂帝開始，明朝十三陵共埋葬了十三位皇帝。

sentences.english: Search Taobao you to take a look to Paradise Square.
sentences.chinese: 你到淘寶搜永樂坊可以看看去。

sentences.english: Paradise Square, you can search to see.
Yongle's handwriting is the worst among all of us.
sentences.chinese: 在我們當中，永樂的書寫是最差的。

sentences.english: What Kinds of Books are Yongle Dadian and Siku Quanshu?
sentences.chinese: 《永樂大典》和《四庫全書》是什麼樣的書？

sentences.english: Liu Yongle was born in Yongchun, Fujian Province in 1945.
sentences.chinese: 劉永樂，1945年出生，福建永春人。

sentences.english: Dr Lo is a specialist in infectious diseases.
sentences.chinese: 勞永樂是感染及傳染病專科醫生。

sentences.english: This is the statue of Emperor Yongle.
sentences.chinese: 這就是永樂皇帝的塑像。

sentences.english: What do you know about Ming Emperor Yongle?
sentences.chinese: 關於明朝的永樂皇帝你知道些什麼？

sentences.english: Zheng he rose to become a trusted official of the Yongle Emperor of the Ming Dinasty.
sentences.chinese: 鄭和成爲了一位受到明朝永樂皇帝信任的。

sentences.english: The third Emperor Yongle of the Ming Dynasty and his wife Empress Xu were buried in this tomb.
sentences.chinese: 明朝第三位永樂皇帝和他的皇后就埋在此陵。

sentences.english: As early as the Yongle reign of the Ming dynasty, Jingdezhen potters tried the making of architectural ceramics.
sentences.chinese: 明代永樂時期，景德鎮陶工就進行了建築陶瓷的嘗試。

sentences.english: The murals in the Yongle Palace total 873 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 永樂宮內璧畫的總體面積達873平方米。

sentences.english: Paradise Square, pure natural "gold series" very suitable aunt use.
sentences.chinese: 永樂坊的純自然的“純金系列”很適宜伯母用。

sentences.english: Despite his veneration of violence, Yongle sought to defang certain parts of Ming society.
sentences.chinese: 雖然他尚武，永樂帝還是削弱了明朝社會的某些部分。

reign name of second Qing emperor (1644-1662)

Jingdezhen prefecture-level city in Jiangxi province 江西, famous for porcelain
court (of king or emperor)

to write down/to record/written account
